User Structure

Base Attributes

Attribute Type Example

id

The user's internal system ID

 Integer 123

username

The user's unique username

 String adamcooke

name.first

The user's first name

 String Adam

name.last

The user's last name

 String Cooke

Extended Attributes

Attribute Type Example

admin

Is this user an administrator?

 Boolean false

created_at

The timestamp the user was created

 Timestamp 2016-12-25 09:42:00 +0000

updated_at

The timestamp the user was updated

 Timestamp 2016-12-25 09:42:00 +0000

support_pin

The PIN this user needs to use to access support

  • Can only be accessed by API users with admin access
 String 4953

mask

The unique mask that represents this user

  • Must not be authenticated (no auth headers provided).
 String abc123abc123

Expansions

Expansions are embedded structures of other objects that are related to the structure that you're viewing. Which expansions are returned by a specific action are shown on that action's documentation however some actions allow you to choose which expansions are returned.

Attribute Type Example

pets

All pets that belong to this user

 Array Pet structure

balance

The user's balance

 Float 12.5
